title: Morgana OP?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: So Im pretty new to the game I started three months ago and Im level 22 now. So I was playing late at night and I played this game where the opponets did not mean to fed me but I was pretty fed I then started getting kills and now I was like 5 levels over everyone else. So this continued and I ended up with a score of 25/0/15. But the thing is it was with {{champion:25}} . Now Im not complaining but Ive heard that she is not very tanky and dose not have great kill power but if thats true how did i get so many kills and no deaths! I want to see if anybody else got a high score with a champion that is not very good, or a high score with morgana

replies.body:
Something to remember about League of Legends is that when playing in pubs or any elo below, I dunno, maybe masters, you don't win games by having a team that's better then the enemies'. You win games by the enemy team being only slightly less retarded than yours.

Thus, in all likelihood the reason why you did so well in that game as Morgana is because the enemy team was bad.
my masteries and runes where shit and second tier. :)
Don't take my comment as a dig on you- I imagine that if your score is what you say it is then mechanically you probably played fairly well.

Im not taking at as a dig, the other team wasnt the best but the didnt just let me get kills the did try to stop me, really i think i got lucky, ive gotten good scores with morg but never this good must be 1 in a million.

Ima have to play her now lol. I was focusing on thresh and lulu at the moment, but hey! I do have that one skin of hers with the white bloody wings in my Hextech loot!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The blackthorn? yeah its really good new particles and everything i was lucky to get it in the hextech loot as well.

> [{quoted}](name=xNAYRUx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LYFm79uF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-17T00:05:59.283+0000)
>
> The blackthorn? yeah its really good new particles and everything i was lucky to get it in the hextech loot as well.

JUst looked it up. Its called exiled. :( Only partical changes are from her autos.

She's not necessarily OP, but she is one of the safest mids to play in the game. She's also a consistent support. However, depending on how fed she gets, and how you build her, yes she can be a force to reckon with. 

Glancing at your match, it also helped that they didn't stack much MR against your team, which ultimately was their downfall considering 4/5 of your team was AP.

Additionally, you need to work on your warding. Far too low.

Thanks I can see that now, really all I did was land dark bind and tormented soil and for people like miss fortune that was a kill.  But I found out that the core of my build was Zhonays Hourglass, i escaped 1 death with that so i guess the team was pretty bad but the wernt terrible. and thanks for the comment on the warding it was just a 5v5 non ranked match so i didnt cross my mind to buy wards because I was doing so well, ill start warding more often in the future thanks for the advice.

> [{quoted}](name=xNAYRUx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LYFm79uF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-17T00:04:10.473+0000)
>
> Thanks I can see that now, really all I did was land dark bind and tormented soil and for people like miss fortune that was a kill.  But I found out that the core of my build was Zhonays Hourglass, i escaped 1 death with that so i guess the team was pretty bad but the wernt terrible. and thanks for the comment on the warding it was just a 5v5 non ranked match so i didnt cross my mind to buy wards because I was doing so well, ill start warding more often in the future thanks for the advice.

No problem. You won't need to buy wards. Yellow trinket refills at a constant rate throughout the game, though putting down a pink on the map is always a great idea.

It's best to start habits early, so getting you used to warding constantly throughout the game will only benefit you and your team. You want that map as lit up as possible. It's a team effort, and at the very least you can do your part.

Just remember, a well placed ward will help prevent your death or one of your teammates. It also can help secure a kill.
Thanks again, I just need to know which wards to buy and were to put them before i hit level 30 and start ranked.
u can see no mr at higher levels than 22, as well :P and it's just ggez after that. Once in aram all 5 of us were ap and they were still building dmg or armor... suit urself, maen
it depends how good the people you were playing against were. if they stayed when low, and if you built full ap, chances are you could il the pretty easily
